snippet.title: Blackjack Bailey VR for Gear VR trailer.
snippet.description:
Blackjack Bailey VR trailer
Play virtual reality blackjack on your Oculus powered, Samsung Gear VR headset. Experience this single player 21 game in a casual, comfortable casino environment, as if you were sitting at a table in Las Vegas. Join the winner's circle and play today!
